Hi, I'm an italian IF author and I wonder if I can turn Questa games into apps for iPhone/iPad.

I'd like to write quest games and share them as apps. It is the only way to make text adventures live again, I think. I tried Bump and it is nice to play it on iPhone. 

In a previous answer, you said: "If you want to turn your game into an app, you'll need to contact me, and I'll work with you to create the app version".

So, you'll do it everytime? Do you have time to do it? 

It would be difficult to do it on my own? (I've programming experience only with Inform... nothing else at all!).
cheers,
fc

Yes, each app needs to be converted be me, but it doesn't need to take me very long - the main thing that takes time is testing the finished app, but that is of course something that you as the game author can help with. It took longer for Bump as that was the first app, and Tim doesn't have an iPhone - hopefully converting other games into apps will be much quicker.

So, when you have finished creating your game, let me know and we can talk about converting it!
